name: Crumbling Edge
description:
Fight your boss in this litte jam game!

Use WASD to move, your mouse to aim and shoot.

And don't forget to pick up your bullets again, we don't want to leave them behind!

My Submission to the VimJam2 (8 bits to infinity).

Music Credits go to:

  •  "Aurora" from Kim Lightyear 
  • "The Rush" from tebruno99
